definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Snowflakes fluttering and bell knock, Christmas Eve to pray for you.
sentences.chinese: 雪花飘飘，钟声敲敲，平安夜为你祈祷。

sentences.english: Santa needs to know if the sun will produce a huge amount of radiation on December 24th.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞老公公问姚平安夜那天会不会有大量的太阳辐射。

sentences.english: The final night of name picking was also the night before Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 最后一晚抽名字正是在平安夜的前一晚。

sentences.english: Silent night, holy night, Son of God, love's pure light.
sentences.chinese: 平安夜，圣善夜，神子爱，光皎洁。

sentences.english: Christmass Eve snow, with my blessing flew into your heart.
sentences.chinese: 平安夜的雪花飘落，带着我的祝福飞进你的心窝。

sentences.english: What? But today is Christmas Eve.
On Christmas Eve the children hang their stockings at the foot of the bed.
sentences.chinese: 平安夜孩子们将长袜挂在床脚头旁边。

sentences.english: On Christmas Eve, little girl sold matches was forced out by my dad.
sentences.chinese: 平安夜，小女孩被爸爸逼迫出来卖火柴。

sentences.english: With no delay, she hurried to the hospital to enjoy Christmas with her mother.
sentences.chinese: 然后立即，赶到医院去陪同她妈妈过平安夜。

sentences.english: Here is a look at some of the more popular and prevalent Christmas Eve traditions.
sentences.chinese: 下面来看看一些比较流行的和普遍平安夜传统。

sentences.english: And what is lurking in the fogs of Christmas Eve?
sentences.chinese: 在平安夜的浓雾当中潜伏著什么的大阴谋？

sentences.english: Please take out the pictures and talk about them in groups.
sentences.chinese: 小组拿出平安夜活动图片，认读，有问题的举手。

sentences.english: Christmas Eve, send blessings, wish you wish to achieve.
sentences.chinese: 平安夜，送祝福，祝你心愿一定实现。

sentences.english: That night was the first time I heard about him catching carp.
sentences.chinese: 这个平安夜是我第一次听他说捕鲤鱼的故事。

sentences.english: Santa Claus always has a busy night on Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞老公公在平安夜总是很忙碌的。

definition: Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar

Qixi Festival or Double Seven Festival on the 7th day of the 7th lunar month/girls' festival/Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女[niu2 lang3 zhi1 nu:3] are allowed their annual meeting
double seven festival, evening of seventh of lunar seventh month/girls' festival/Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女 are allowed their annual meeting
to step into the new year/New Year
Singles' Day (November 11), originally a day of activities for single people, but now also the world's biggest annual retail sales day
